title: North Korea suspends talks with South scheduled for Wednesday | North Korean Insight
text:
North Korea suspends talks with South scheduled for Wednesday May 15, 2018 | Reuters | Shares: 0
WASHINGTON (Reuters) â€“ North Korea said on Wednesday it had no choice but to suspend high-level talks with South Korea scheduled for later in the day due to U.S.-South Korean military exercises that went against the trend of warming North-South ties.
